article_title: Teacher Made Up Claim He Was Stabbed by Attacker Citing Islamic State
article_text:
PARIS—A kindergarten teacher in suburban Paris admitted to fabricating a story that he was stabbed Monday by a masked man who invoked Islamic State, French police and the Paris prosecutor’s office said.

The teacher initially told authorities that an attacker, dressed in a painter’s uniform with his face concealed, entered an elementary school located in the northern suburb of Aubervilliers on Monday morning at around 7:10 a.m.,...
